amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 747 the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 115-61, modified by the amendment printed in Part B of the report is considered as adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 747 the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 115-61, modified by the amendment printed in Part B of the report is considered as adopted.
